content: Adult Learners | Temasek Polytechnic SHARE DIGITAL FILM & TELEVISION | SCHOOL OF DESIGN | TEMASEK POLYTECHNICS https://www.tp.edu.sg/ Transform Your Skills for Tomorrow with Temasek SkillsFuture Academy! Temasek SkillsFuture Academy (TSA) at Temasek Polytechnic is your gateway to recharging your career. We offer lifelong learning opportunities and professional development for individuals at all stages of their careers. Our comprehensive range of courses and programmes is designed to meet the evolving demands of industries such as digital technology, sustainability, engineering, and care, ensuring that individuals gain relevant skills and knowledge in these emerging domains. Transform your skills with us and be a part of creating tomorrow's success stories! Highlights Course Previews for Part-Time Diploma & Specialist Diploma Join us this November for our course previews and explore a variety of Part-Time Diploma and Post-Diploma programmes tailored for adult learners! Don’t miss this opportunity to advance your learning journey! MORE DETAILS INSIGHTS - Creating tomorrow with Continuing Education Welcome to INSIGHTS! Hear our industry professionals and education specialists' thoughts and perspectives on the latest trends, evolving landscapes, and best continuing education strategies to help you become the forerunner of your industry. MORE DETAILS Investing in Yourself Singapore Budget 2024 In a forward-thinking approach to workforce development, Singapore's Budget 2024 has unveiled key initiatives that underscore the nation's commitment to lifelong learning and competitive career progression. MORE DETAILS Micro-Credentials@TP Elevate your career with tailored programmes that offer flexibility, recognise your previous achievements, and provide streamlined paths to earning advanced certifications! MORE DETAILS How can we help you? Access our list of industry-relevant training courses to help you develop relevant skills and meet the challenges of the future economy. GO VIEW THE FULL COURSE LISTING SUBSCRIBE TO UPDATES Course Types Find your course of interest by checking out our range of courses from the categories below. Online Learning Our online courses allow you to learn remotely and at your own pace. You can also download our mobile app and learn on the go with our wide range of Micro-Learning Courses (MLC). LEARN MORE Part-Time Diploma/Post-Diploma & Modular Courses Discover our Part-Time Diploma, Post-Diploma, and Stackable Skills-Based Modular Courses designed for adult learners. LEARN MORE SkillsFuture Career Transition Programme The SkillsFuture Career Transition Programme (SCTP) supports mid-career individuals in acquiring industry-relevant skills to improve employability and pivot to new sectors or job roles. LEARN MORE Short Courses Our short courses are designed for busy working individuals who seek to acquire knowledge or skills for professional development or personal enrichment. LEARN MORE SkillsFuture Series The SkillsFuture Series is a list of short, industry-relevant training programmes that span across eight broad categories of emerging skills. Eligible Singaporeans and Permanent Residents will receive up to 70% in additional course fee funding. LEARN MORE SkillsFuture Work-Study Programmes These programmes are designed to give fresh polytechnic and ITE graduates (Singaporeans and PRs) a career head-start in their relevant disciplines. LEARN MORE SAP Skills University Singapore A joint initiative by SkillsFuture Singapore, SAP Skills University and participating polytechnics, these courses equip you with relevant skills for in-demand technical roles and attain industry-recognised qualifications. LEARN MORE Silver Generation Courses Discover specially designed courses to help seniors lead active lives. These courses are also suitable for individuals who wish to be equipped with the knowledge and skills to age well – physically, mentally and socially. LEARN MORE University Preparatory Programme The University Preparatory Programme aims to help polytechnic graduates or current students to strengthen their foundation in Mathematics and the Sciences, so as to prepare them for university. LEARN MORE Emerging Domains Our part-time courses are organised into nine emerging domains and their respective areas. Click on the domain to find the suitable course(s) you can take to up-skill and stay relevant in the new economy. Digital Take advantage of the latest that technology has to offer! AI • Cybersecurity • Digital Analytics • Digital Media • ICT & Media • Technology • Tech-enabled EXPLORE COURSES Care Stay ahead to meet the evolving demands of the care sector. Adult Education • Community Care • Healthcare • Social Service • Training • Wellness EXPLORE COURSES Green Drive the change to make our planet greener. Aquaculture • Energy & Power • Sustainability • Urban Solution EXPLORE COURSES More Emerging Domains... Advanced Manufacturing Keep pushing boundaries in the Industry 4.0 frontier. Aerospace • Electronics • Energy & Chemicals • Food Manufacturing • Precision Engineering EXPLORE COURSES Business Management Sharpen your business management skills to bring your enterprise to the next level. Accounting • Business Analytics • Business Development • Financial Services & Governance • Marketing EXPLORE COURSES Business Services Stay relevant to serve the needs of local and global enterprises. Customer Service • Events • F&B • Hotel • Retail EXPLORE COURSES Security / Built Environment Break new ground to improve places and spaces! Architecture & Design • Facility Management • Security EXPLORE COURSES Trade & Connectivity Gain new insights into best global trade practices! Air Transport • Logistics EXPLORE COURSES Professional Skills & Lifestyle Broaden your horizons to create new opportunities! Corporate Governance • Design • Entrepreneurship • Legal • Veterinary EXPLORE COURSES More Services Boost your workforce with tailored Corporate Training or enhance your security skills at the Security Industry Institute. Achieve your career goals today! Corporate Training / Workplace Learning Your organisation’s strategy for success starts here! We can help to recommend, design and conduct customised training solutions, as well as work with you to achieve various staff development needs. MORE DETAILS Security Industry Institute The Security Industry Institute (SII) is a Continuing Education & Training (CET) centre for WSQ Security training. Established in September 2007, SII offers nationally recognised and comprehensive professional security training and quality job placements for security personnel. MORE DETAILS Other Resources Looking for other information? Click on any of the items below to access them quickly. CET STUDENT PORTAL FEES & FINANCIAL MATTERS FREE RESOURCES @ TP LIBGUIDES TP CAMPUS MAP & FACILITIES Contact Details Enquire Now Mainline 67881212 Monday - Thursday: 8:30am - 6:00pm Friday: 8:30am - 5:30pm Closed during lunchtime, 12:00pm - 1:00pm and on weekends and public holidays. https://www.tp.edu.sg/tsa Temasek SkillsFuture Academy (TSA) Temasek Polytechnic East Wing, Block 1A, Level 3, Unit 109 21 Tampines Ave 1 Singapore 529757 We use cookies to offer you a better browsing experience. By continuing, you are agreeing to the use of cookies on your device as described in our privacy statement. Accept
